branchCategory.name: VVPA4 Manifold for VPA4*54 Valve
branchCategory.description: Series VPA4 is a 5 port air operated valve with a rubber seal.  The series is available with or without a sub-plate.  Applicable thread types include Rc, G, NPT, NPTF
